title: I want to draw a straight line very, very slow without wobbling, is this possible with time and practice? - Quora

response.answer_text: You ight be better to invest in a “straight edge” and use that as it doesn't need any practice and will give you what you want immediately..

You will have smoother lines if you draw straight lines quickly. experiment with different pens and brushes and see what works best for you. Most professional artists use a ruler when they need lines to be perfectly straight.
